Name: Linear Programming

Name: Nonlinear Programming
Description: Optimization with nonlinear objective and constraints. Solvability: Depends on problem structure.

Name: Quadratic Programming
Description: Optimization with quadratic objective and linear constraints. Solvability: Yes (Quadratic algorithms).

Name: Integer Programming
Description: Optimization with integer variables. Solvability: NP-hard (exact methods).

Name: Convex Optimization
Description: Optimization with convex objective and constraints. Solvability: Yes (Interior Point Methods).

Name: Stochastic Programming
Description: Optimization with random variables. Solvability: Requires scenario analysis.

Name: Dynamic Programming
Description: Optimization with recursive decision-making. Solvability: Yes (DP algorithms).

Name: Combinatorial Optimization
Description: Optimization with discrete decision variables. Solvability: NP-hard (heuristics).

Name: Semi-definite Programming
Description: Optimization with semi-definite constraints. Solvability: Yes (Interior Point Methods).

Name: Multi-objective Optimization
Description: Optimization with multiple conflicting objectives. Solvability: Trade-off analysis.
